targets.label: RDS Writer CPU
targets.sqlExpression: SELECT AVG(CPUUtilization) FROM "AWS/RDS" WHERE Role = 'WRITER' AND DBClusterIdentifier = 'production-pg-cluster'

targets.label: RDS Writer conn...
targets.sqlExpression: SELECT SUM(DatabaseConnections) FROM "AWS/RDS" WHERE Role = 'WRITER' AND DBClusterIdentifier = 'production-pg-cluster'

targets.label: RDS Writer Freeable Memory
targets.sqlExpression: SELECT AVG(FreeableMemory) FROM "AWS/RDS" WHERE Role = 'WRITER' AND DBClusterIdentifier = 'production-pg-cluster'

targets.label: RDS Reader CPU
targets.sqlExpression: SELECT AVG(CPUUtilization) FROM "AWS/RDS" WHERE Role = 'READER' AND DBClusterIdentifier = 'production-pg-cluster'

targets.label: RDS Reader conn...
targets.sqlExpression: SELECT SUM(DatabaseConnections) FROM "AWS/RDS" WHERE Role = 'READER' AND DBClusterIdentifier = 'production-pg-cluster'

targets.label: RDS Reader Freeable Memory
targets.sqlExpression: SELECT AVG(FreeableMemory) FROM "AWS/RDS" WHERE Role = 'READER' AND DBClusterIdentifier = 'production-pg-cluster'
